#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long int n=0,m=0;   
int chek(int dig)
{
    if(dig==0)
	return 1;
    else if(m%dig==0)
    	return 1;
    else return 0;
}
     
int main()
{
    cin >> n;
    m=n;
    int check=0,digit=0;
    while(n!=0)
    {
	    digit=n%10;
	    check=chek(digit);
	    if(check==0)
	    {
    		cout << "Invalid\n";
    		break;
    	    }
    	    n=n/10;
    }
    if(check)
    	cout << "Valid\n";
    return 0;
}
